short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Riddle World is a browser add-on that provides a collection of riddles  for mental stimulation while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Riddle World, the ultimate browser add-on designed to infuse your web browsing experience with mental stimulation and playful engagement! Dive into a world of clever challenges and mind-bending riddles as you navigate the digital realm.

With Riddle World, every browsing session becomes an opportunity to exercise your brain and unravel a collection of thought-provoking enigmas. Whether you're researching, shopping, or simply exploring the vast expanse of the internet, our browser extension seamlessly integrates a variety of intriguing riddles to keep your mind sharp and entertained.
